Name: ACCOUNTNAME
Description: Homing account name for the vendor bank account to which payments are made. Use 30 or fewer digits.

Name: BANKACCOUNTNUMBER
Description: Homing account number for the vendor bank account to which payments are made. Use 31 or fewer digits.

Name: BRANCHCODE
Description: Homing branch, which is the 6-digit branch number of the vendor bank

Name: ACCOUNTTYPE
Description: Account type for the vendor bank account to which payments are made. Use 1 for cheque account, 2 for savings account, 3 for transmission account, or 4 for bond account.

Name: ACCOUNTCODE
Description: Beneficiary account code. Use 20 or fewer characters.

Name: PROOFOFPYMT
Description: Proof of payment flag, which specifies whether to print the proof of payment when the bank file payment is authorized. Use false for No, true for Yes.

Name: PYMTREFERENCE
Description: User reference, which is a meaningful reference number to connect the bank file and the bills to be paid, enabling payments to be tracked. Use 20 or fewer alphanumeric characters.
